entry.dcterms:description: Classification of occupations, occupational mobility between 1930 and 1982. This study - as a part of "Stratification-model study" - focused on the change of occupational structure and occupational prestige. This data collection is an occupational level aggregated datafile and it contains computed variables.

National representative sample of 18330 respondents based on the Unified Population Data Collection System. Occupations were listed in the sample based on the four-digit codes of the Uniform Classification System of Occupations (FEOR), these were grouped by the presetige point system of D. Treiman (1977) into 216 occupational categories, then they were clustered into 10 occupational groups.
